get.summary: Get Transaction History for Client as a time and value series
get.description: This API returns dates and values and so is suitable for using when fetching larger datasets or for rendering charts. The date range should not exceed 90 days

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The transaction category (required)

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The start date of the range (required)

parameters.name: partyId
parameters.description: Client Id. The special value "me" can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The end date of the range (required)

200.description: One or more account transaction history were found

Content-Type.description: Content type for the returned resource
